title: Successful multi-step work permit request with data persistence
description: Verify that a user can successfully complete and submit a multi-step work permit request form, with form data saved in localStorage to persist across page reloads or session interruptions.

steps.description: Navigate to Nuevo Permiso (New Permit) page
Fill out step 1 of the permit form with valid data
Proceed to step 2 and fill out all required fields correctly
Simulate a page reload
Verify that all previously entered form data is restored from localStorage
Complete remaining steps and submit the permit request
Verify that the permit request is submitted successfully and confirmation is shown

title: Form validation enforces mandatory gas testing for Hot Work permits
description: Verify that the permit form enforces conditional validation that requires gas testing data to be entered when the permit type is Hot Work.

steps.description: Start a new work permit request and select 'Hot Work' as permit type
Attempt to proceed without entering gas testing data
Verify that the form shows validation errors requiring gas testing information
Enter valid gas testing data
Verify that validation errors are cleared and user can proceed

title: Role-based access control restricts Safety Officer permit authorization
description: Verify that only users with the Safety Officer role can access permit authorization features, ensuring segregation of duties.

steps.description: Log in as a user with Permittee role
Navigate to permits pending authorization
Verify that authorization controls are not visible or accessible
Log out and log in as a Safety Officer user
Navigate to permits pending authorization
Verify that authorization controls are visible and fully functional

title: CRUD operations on personnel records by administrator
description: Verify that an administrator can create, read, update, and delete personnel profiles correctly within the personnel management module.

steps.description: Log in as an Administrator
Open Personnel Management page
Create a new personnel record with valid data
Verify that the new personnel record appears in the list
Select the created personnel and update fields
Verify that updates are saved and reflected in the UI
Delete the created personnel record
Verify that the personnel record is removed from the list

title: Realtime incident reporting updates with latency under 120 ms
description: Verify that incident reports submitted are reflected on the incident monitoring interface with realtime updates within the specified latency thresholds.

steps.description: Log in as any user with access to event reporting
Submit a new incident report with valid data
Verify that the incident appears on the real-time monitoring dashboard within 120 milliseconds

title: Export reports include corporate header and cost center aggregation
description: Verify that exported PDF and Excel reports contain the correct corporate branding headers and data aggregations grouped by cost centers and service orders.

steps.description: Navigate to reports export interface
Generate export in PDF format
Verify the PDF includes corporate headers and grouped data by cost center and service order
Generate export in Excel format
Verify the Excel file includes the corporate header and correctly aggregates data by cost center and service order

title: Permit form rejects submission if required fields are incomplete
description: Ensure form validation prevents submission when required fields are not filled, maintaining at least 98.7% accuracy in validation enforcement.

steps.description: Start a new permit request
Leave one or more required fields empty
Attempt to submit the permit form
Verify that submission is blocked and appropriate validation messages are displayed

title: Signed URL access restrictions and expiry functionality
description: Verify that signed URLs used to securely deliver permit and report documents expire as expected and block unauthorized access after expiration.

steps.description: Obtain a signed URL for a permit document as an authorized user
Verify access to the document through the signed URL is successful before expiry
Simulate time passing beyond the signed URL expiry time
Attempt to access the document using the same signed URL
Verify that access is blocked due to URL expiration

title: Dashboard displays accurate and timely HSE metrics and active tasks
description: Verify that the dashboard loads correctly and displays up-to-date HSE metrics, active permits, and incident statuses for all users.

steps.description: Log in as any authorized user
Navigate to the Dashboard page
Verify that all key HSE metrics are displayed with current data
Verify that active operational tasks and incident statuses are present and accurate

title: System uptime meets or exceeds 99.3% availability requirement
description: Validate through monitoring and test scripts that the system remains available and responsive, achieving the required uptime benchmark.

steps.description: Simulate typical user workloads including permit requests, reporting, and personnel management over an extended period
Verify system uptime monitoring reports availability of 99.3% or higher

title: Signature capture stores base64 images and enables printable document generation
description: Verify that users can capture digital signatures as base64 encoded images and that these signatures correctly propagate to printable permit documents using window communication.

steps.description: Access permit authorization page as Safety Officer
Use the signature capture component to draw and save a signature
Verify that signature is saved in base64 image format correctly
Generate a printable permit document
Verify that the signature appears correctly in the printable document via window communication
